initial.$description: Light-teal background for primary actions or highlights.

hover.$description: Darker teal background on hover for primary actions. USED IN: Button (outline and transparent variants), ProgressButton (Outline variant), SplitButton (outline), .TabBar-Item, Toggle, chip

active.$description: Darkest teal background on pressed for primary actions. USED IN: Button (outline and transparent variants), ProgressButton (Outline variant), SplitButton (outline), .TabBar-Item, Toggle, chip

initial.$description: Deep Teal background for most prominent, primary actions or highlights. USED IN: Button (filled), ProgressButton (filled), SplitButton

hover.$description: Darker teal background on hover for most prominent, primary actions or highlights. USED IN: Button (filled), ProgressButton (filled), SplitButton

active.$description: Darkest teal background on pressed for most prominent, primary actions or highlights. USED IN: Button (filled), ProgressButton (filled), SplitButton

initial.$description: Light-teal highlight for selectable elements. USED IN: ValueSwitch-item, Chip, Checkbox, RadioButton, TabBar-Item, VerticalMenu-Item

hover.$description: Darker teal on hover for backgrounds in selectable elements. USED IN: ValueSwitch-item, Chip, Checkbox, RadioButton, TabBar-Item, VerticalMenu-Item, List Item

active.$description: Darkest teal on pressed for backgrounds in selectable elements. USED IN: ValueSwitch-item, Chip, Checkbox, RadioButton, TabBar-Item, VerticalMenu-Item, List Item

initial.$description: Mid-teal background for most prominent, selectable elements. USED IN: RadioButton

hover.$description:
Darker mid-teal background on hover for most prominent, selectable elements.
USED IN: RadioButton

active.$description:
Darkest mid-teal background on pressed for most prominent, selectable elements.
USED IN: RadioButton

primary-copy.$description:
Disabled background for primary backgrounds
USED IN: Filled Button and other very prominent primary components when disabled.

primary.$description: Teal accent color for text and icons on light surfaces.

primary-inverted.$description: Light teal color for text and icons on light surfaces.

selected.$description: Teal color for selected text and icons on light surfaces.

selected-inverted.$description: Very light teal color for selected text and icons on light surfaces.

primary-bold.$description:
❌ Dark teal border accent for most prominent emphasis.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

primary.$description:
❌ Light teal border accent for emphasis.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

selected-bold.$description:
❌ Teal border indicating the selected state (most prominent).
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]

selected.$description:
❌ Faint teal border indicating the selected state.
[Used as reference token only for the Border composite tokens]
